tag: {display:{Name:'{"text":"屹立不倒！","italic": false}',Lore:['{"text":"图腾分数达到 16 时解锁。","color":"gray","italic": false}','""','{"text":"图腾消耗时，将传送到任意一个复活点上。","color":"gray","italic": false}','""','{"text":"获取图腾分数时，均恢复 2 点生命值。","color":"gray","italic": false}','{"text":"其中，图腾分数获取方式及分数：","color":"gray","italic": false}','{"text":"火球术：2","color":"gray","italic": false}','{"text":"远程折跃传送成功：2","color":"gray","italic": false}','{"text":"百变符 · 武器充能：2","color":"gray","italic": false}','{"text":"百变符 · 书（充能）攻击：6","color":"gray","italic": false}','""','[{"text":"✳ 冷却  ","italic": false,"color":"aqua"},{"text":" 40 秒","italic": false,"color":"white"}]','[{"text":"✏ 细节  按 [","color":"dark_gray","italic": false},{"keybind":"key.drop"}, "] 收起详情"]']},HideFlags:63}
